job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: stronguOpportunity OverviewbrbrustrongCohere Health is illuminating healthcare for patients their doctors and all those who are important in a patients healthcare experience both in and out of the doctors office Founded in August 2019 we are obsessed with eliminating wasteful friction patients and doctors experience in areas that have nothing to do with health and treatment particularly for diagnoses that require expensive procedures or medications To that end we build software that is expressly designed to ensure the appropriate plan of care is understood and expeditiously approved so that patients and doctors can focus on health rather than payment or administrative hasslesbrbrIn this role youll join our growing team of worldclass engineers statisticians and clinical experts to deploy machine learning algorithms that help automate burdensome administrative clinical practices You will be tasked with finding the most promising opportunities for impact and then delivering on thembrbrThis is a unique opportunity to join a high caliber engineering team that is growing quickly You will build impactful healthcare technology on a modern tech stackbrbrstrongWhat You Will DobrbrstrongulliFind the signal in incoherent clinical dataliliBuild reliable and scalable production machine learning systemsliliWork on feature engineering statistical analysis developing novel ML techniques understanding classifier performance and ensuring fitforpurposeliliWork crossfunctionally across diverse stakeholders including product managers statisticians EHR data specialists and physiciansbrliulstrongWhat You Will HavebrbrstrongulliYou have at 5 years experience in applied ML in the industry with a degree or higher MSPhD in computer science machine learning mathematics or similar fieldliliClear understanding of model building model maintenance and the measures that optimize models for product useliliUnderstand experimental design and can independently perform collection measurement and interpretation of resultsliliExpert in R SQLPython or other common analytical data toolsliliExpert in linear regression and classification approachesliliHandsOn experience with ElasticSearch brliulstrongBonus Points IfbrbrstrongulliHave experience with healthcare data such as claims and EMR dataliliHave hands on experience building NLP models using Spacy from clinical narrativesliliExperience with TensorFlow is also a plusbrliulstrongEqual Opportunity StatementbrbrstrongCohere Health is an Equal Opportunity Employer We are committed to fostering an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all To us its personalbrbrWe cant wait to learn more about you and meet you at Cohere Health
